Add the following to the list of feats your drone can select: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Y0DoKrEp5WZY4WAu]{Ambush Awareness (Combat)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.7VAXjEhaqadFFCqT]{Climbing Master}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.MrtFI7pke9a514YM]{Echolocation Attack}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Gn5eNZHpqqrEZ8jh]{Memory Access}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.EqQh66cutYbhmd51]{Swimming Master}.
